text: Soni chisimu chene Musa twampele chitabu, basi ni wapatikene mwalakwemo ukangani, mwanti lingaŵaga liloŵe lyalyalongolele lyakuumila kwa Ambuje ŵenu (Allah lyangapa ilagasyo yekulungwa nnope ikaŵeje ku Kiyama), chisimu kungajilanyidwe chilikati chao, soni chisimu ŵanganyao ali m’chikaiko chekulungwa chakuchikaichila chalakwecho
